casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Appellee, v. Jerome POSTER, alias Jerry, Appellant. No. 9058. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit Submitted on Briefs Jan. 24,1946. Decided Feb. 1, 1946. Appellant submitted his brief in typewritten form with copies for the court only. Gerald A. Gleeson and Thomas J. Clary, both of Philadelphia, Pa., for appellee.

Before BIGGS, GOODRICH, and O’CONNELL, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The order of the court below denying the defendant’s motion for a new trial is. affirmed.
